content.description: The images show two views of the Colosseum (Flavian Amphitheater).
content.question: The facade decorations of the Colosseum were notable in that

choices.label: statues of famous athletes were originally displayed in the niches to attract crowds
spolia was included to celebrate the victories of the Roman army
different architectural orders of columns were used to distinguish each level
fences were incorporated as an early form of crowd control

content.answer: different architectural orders of columns were used to distinguish each level

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
